item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: This Privacy Policy informs you of our privacy practices and of the choices you can make about the way information about you, including from your online activity is collected and how that information is used by our site. This privacy policy link is readily available at the bottom of every web page on this website. At www.leowkahman.com, we recognize that privacy of your personal information is important. Here is information on what types of personal information we receive and collect when you use and visit our siteu, and how we safeguard your information.

item.title: About
item.description: I am Leow Kah Man, a Software Architect and Full Stack Software Developer, lives in Malaysia, likes just about anything that has to do with technology. Designing cloud architectures that drive new innovations, raise scalability and reduce time to deploy is what I am passionate about. I believe microservice infrastructure is the most efficient way to scale, have high availability and ease of maintenance. During my spare time, I like tinkering with OpenWRT and Raspberry Pi, and trying out new cloud services.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please comment on posts if you have questions regarding a specific post. For general matters, you may contact me preferably by sending a private message via Facebook or dropping me a message via the contact form below: Loading...
